text: Hur la go tama daane madua o dono damana go Caleb mai dono lodo Ephrath; di hagadili o maa la ne daamada ne hau di waahale o Bethlehem. Hur ne hai ana dama daane dogodolu go Etam, Penuel, mo Ezer. Etam guu hai ana dama daane dogodolu go Jezreel, Ishma, mo Idbash, ge dahi dama ahina go Hazzelelponi. Penuel ne daamada ne hau di waahale o Gedor, ge Ezer ne hau Hushah.
